files.patch:
@@ -67,1 +67,6 @@
-                var output = oa.asLines();
+                var output = oa.asLines()
+                        // Workaround for JLine's weird behavior where it appends space+backspace
+                        // characters to the prompt in certain conditions.
+                        .stream()
+                        .map(line -> line.replaceFirst(" \b$", ""))
+                        .toList();
